tasks.title: Secure File Transfer Tool
tasks.description: Develop a CLI tool in Python that encrypts files (AES-256) before transferring them over SFTP/SCP. Include checksum verification and a logging system for failed transfers.
tasks.author: Benjamin Hayes

tasks.title: Server Health Dashboard
tasks.description: Build a web-based dashboard (React + Flask) displaying real-time server metrics (CPU, RAM, disk space) fetched from Prometheus. Add alerting for critical thresholds.
tasks.author: Brandon Pierce

tasks.title: Password Manager CLI
tasks.description: TCreate a command-line password manager in Python that stores credentials securely (SQLite + bcrypt), allows generation of strong passwords, and supports search/export.
tasks.author: Jason Reedch

tasks.title: Automated Incident Response Bot
tasks.description: Develop a Slack/Discord bot that triggers IT incident workflows (e.g., restart services, notify teams) based on alerts from monitoring tools like Zabbix or PagerDuty.
tasks.author: Anthony Russo

tasks.title: Wi-Fi Security Auditor
tasks.description: Write a Python script that scans nearby Wi-Fi networks, checks for weak encryption (WEP/WPA2), and flags vulnerable devices using scapy.
tasks.author: Leonardo Santos

tasks.title: Dark Web Monitoring Tool
tasks.description: Create a script that checks leaked credential databases (via HaveIBeenPwned API) and alerts users if their emails/passwords appear in breaches.
tasks.author: Sophie Bennett

tasks.title: Cloud Cost Optimizer
tasks.description: Build a tool (AWS SDK/Boto3) to identify idle EC2 instances, underutilized RDS databases, and suggest cost-saving measures.
tasks.author: Abigail Stone

tasks.title: Log Anomaly Detector.
tasks.description: Design a Python script using ML (scikit-learn) to detect unusual patterns in server logs (e.g., brute-force attacks) and flag them for review.
tasks.author: Asher Bennett

tasks.title: Kubernetes Auto-Healing System
tasks.description: Develop a Helm chart that automatically restarts failed pods, scales deployments based on CPU, and notifies Slack if crashes persist.
tasks.author: Matteo Rossi

tasks.title: Multi-Factor Auth (MFA) Bypass Tester
tasks.description: Create a penetration testing tool that simulates MFA bypass techniques (e.g., session hijacking) to assess vulnerability in web apps.
tasks.author: Ronan Blake
